EndPosition.description: How close to the end of the spline the pulley should be before forcing the player off. The larger the number, the earlier the drop.

IsJumpCancel.description: When true, allows the player to jump off the pulley.

PathID.description: ID of the guide path to follow.

StartPosition.description: Adjusts how far along the spline the pulley spawns.

Extra.name: A handle which carries Sonic along a guide spline.
